sections.title: Cinematic expertise
sections.text: Sony is involved in every aspect of filmmaking from movie shoots and post-production editing to studio broadcasts and cinema screenings. Our specialist knowledge allows us to replicate the cinema experience in your home.

sections.title: Cinematic pictures
sections.text: With a deep understanding of film production, we have the expertise to bring movies home and fill your space with cinematic excitement.

sections.title: Cinematic sound
sections.text: BRAVIA with advanced picture technologies delivers brightness that conventional TVs can't match for vivid and authentic entertainment.

sections.title: Creator's vision
sections.text: Pair with BRAVIA Theatre for true home cinema. 360 Spatial Sound Mapping creates multiple phantom speakers, immersing you in movies.

sections.title: SONY PICTURES CORE
sections.text: BRAVIA is equipped with Studio Calibrated mode to reproduce the picture and sound quality as intended by the creators.

sections.title: Cinematic film experience
sections.text: SONY PICTURES CORE makes it easy to enjoy the latest movie releases and film classics.
